allow:
Bash(git -C "D:\\github_repository\\library-management-system" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: add environment example configuration file

- Add .env.example with placeholder values for all required environment
  variables including Supabase, Stripe, Resend, and PostgreSQL config
- Update .gitignore to allow tracking .env.example while keeping
  actual env files ignored
- Helps new developers quickly set up the project

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "D:\\github_repository\\library-management-system" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: add database management guide to CLAUDE.md

- Document Supabase CLI as the primary database management tool
- List common commands for migrations, type generation, and SQL execution
- Clarify that ORM tools \(Prisma, Drizzle\) should not be introduced
- Explain the project''s data access patterns using RPC and RLS

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "D:\\github_repository\\library-management-system" add CLAUDE.md README.md package.json src/app/books/page.tsx src/app/cookies/page.tsx src/app/layout.tsx src/app/login/page.tsx src/app/page.tsx src/app/privacy/page.tsx src/app/register/page.tsx src/app/terms/page.tsx src/components/layout/Footer.tsx src/components/layout/Header.tsx src/lib/resend.ts src/lib/supabase-client.ts public/libraryos-brand.svg public/libraryos-logo.svg public/library-management-system-brand.svg public/library-management-system-logo.svg)

Bash(git -C "D:\\github_repository\\library-management-system" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
refactor\(brand\): rebrand project to LibraryOS

- Rename project from "Library Management System" to "LibraryOS"
- Update package.json name field
- Update metadata in root layout \(title, description, icons\)
- Update Header and Footer components with new branding
- Update landing page hero section and marketing copy
- Update authentication pages \(login, register\)
- Update books page welcome message
- Update legal pages \(privacy, terms, cookies\)
- Update email templates with LibraryOS branding
- Change Supabase auth storage key to ''libraryos-auth''
- Rename logo files to libraryos-logo.svg and libraryos-brand.svg
- Update documentation \(README.md, CLAUDE.md\)

BREAKING CHANGE: Auth storage key changed, existing users will need to re-login

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "D:\\github_repository\\library-management-system" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add Supabase database keep-alive system

- Add keep_alive heartbeat table and ping\(\) RPC function
- Create /api/health/ping endpoint for health checks
- Add GitHub Actions workflow to ping database every 3 days
- Update CLAUDE.md with keep-alive documentation

This prevents the Supabase free tier database from being
auto-paused due to 7-day inactivity limit.

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
